solution_line_template: Tom needs to pass for {record_to_beat} - {current_yards} = <<{record_to_beat}-{current_yards}={yards_needed}>>{yards_needed} yards to beat the record.
Therefore, he needs to average {yards_needed} yards / {games_left} games = <<{yards_needed}/{games_left}={yards_per_game_needed}>>{yards_per_game_needed} yards per game.
